bug.author: ORlGlN
bug.summary: model link for transformer in espnet/egs/tedlium3/asr1 not working
bug.description:
The model link with the following details returned 404 on Google Drive, anyone able to fix the link? file path: espnet/egs/tedlium3/asr1/RESULTS.md model name: Transformer (elayers=12, dlayers=6, units=2048, 8 GPUs, specaug) + large LM model link: <denchmark-link:https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wYYTwgvbB7uy6agHywhQfnuVWWW_obmO>https://drive.google.com/open?id=1wYYTwgvbB7uy6agHywhQfnuVWWW_obmO</denchmark-link>
Thanks in advance.

comments.comment: This is the same problem as <denchmark-link:https://github.com/espnet/espnet/issues/1590>#1590</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ahmedalbahnasawy>@ahmedalbahnasawy</denchmark-link> , do you also have a tedlium3 model?
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sw005320>@sw005320</denchmark-link> done I uploaded it to your drive.
